title: Moitié.e.s
overview: What if the perfect couple didn't exist? Short humorous program imagined by Pauline Clément, Moitié.e.s talks about love and has fun with the contemporary evolutions of the couple. In each episode, Pauline Clément embodies a different character within a singular couple: free, postpartum, toxic, remote... In the form of intimate interviews, the halves will share their daily life, their sentimental or sexual life and their way to love each other in their own way.
